FAQ / Wave 5 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Megatron - Fallen Hero

  1. If Megatron defends and I flip at least one orange battle icon, but Megatron is KO'd in the attack, will his ability still work and do 1 damage to the attacker? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. Once Megatron's ability triggers, it will still work even if Megatron if KO'd.
